quote: It is absolutely okay with me if you need to keep some secrets. I've been thinking about this and I decided that a best friend is someone who, when they don't understand, they still understand.
quote_letters: IT IS ABSOLUTELY OKAY WITH ME IF YOU NEED TO KEEP SOME SECRETS IVE BEEN THINKING ABOUT THIS AND I DECIDED THAT A BEST FRIEND IS SOMEONE WHO WHEN THEY DONT UNDERSTAND THEY STILL UNDERSTAND
